name: Pigeon Panic! (Breadward2005)
description:
You are a pigeon defending your park.  For years the humans have waltzed through here, littering the whole way.  It's time for revenge.  Your goal?  To poop on the heads of every human you see.  Use the chips they drop to fuel your attack.  If you run out, it's game over.

Use your mouse to control the pigeon.

Made mostly by me with a few art contributions by my sisters and audio help from my dad.

Background sounds from ZapSplat.
